    • Method Detail

      • deleteReferencesFromTextIndex

        @GET(value="/api/async/deletefromtextindex/v1")
JobId deleteReferencesFromTextIndex(@Query(value="index")
                                      String index,
                                      @Query(value="index_reference")
                                      List<String> references)
                                    throws IodErrorException
        Deletes the documents with the given references using an API key provided by a RequestInterceptor
        Parameters:
        index - The index to delete from
        references - The references of the documents to delete
        Returns:
        The job ID of the request
        Throws:
        IodErrorException - If an error occurs with the request

      • deleteReferencesFromTextIndex

        @GET(value="/api/async/deletefromtextindex/v1")
JobId deleteReferencesFromTextIndex(@Query(value="apiKey")
                                      String apiKey,
                                      @Query(value="index")
                                      String index,
                                      @Query(value="index_reference")
                                      List<String> references)
                                    throws IodErrorException
        Deletes the documents with the given references using the given API key
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key to use to authenticate the request
        index - The index to delete from
        references - The references of the documents to delete
        Returns:
        The job ID of the request
        Throws:
        IodErrorException - If an error occurs with the request

      • getJobStatus

        @GET(value="/job/status/{jobId}")
DeleteFromTextIndexService.DeleteFromTextIndexJobStatus getJobStatus(@Query(value="apiKey")
                                                                       String apiKey,
                                                                       @Path(value="jobId")
                                                                       JobId jobId)
                                                                     throws IodErrorException
        Get the status of an DeleteFromTextIndex job
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key to use to authenticate the request
        jobId - The id of the job
        Returns:
        An object containing the status of the job along with the result if the job has finished
        Throws:
        IodErrorException - If an error occurred retrieving the status
